Wind 
 Ursula Nafula
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The wind roars. 
 
 
 
 It roars past our home. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The wind is powerful. 
 
 
 
 It tears my kite from 
 
 my hand. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I run after my kite. 
 
 
 
 The wind blows me 
 
 away from the kite! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The wind becomes 
 
 a tornado. 
 
 
 
 It caries my kite 
 
 higher and higher. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The tornado 
 
 swalows me up! 
 
 
 
 I se nothing, 
 
 I touch nothing. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Where is my kite now? 
 
 
 
 Perhaps it is caught 
 
 in a tre. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Perhaps my kite is 
 
 stil flying in the sky. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 The wind finaly 
 
 dies down. 
 
 
 
 I am stil spining. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 When I stop spining 
 
 I lok around. 
 
 
 
 Where did the wind go? 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 I canot se my 
 
 kite anywhere. 
 
 
 
 I canot hear the 
 
 wind anymore. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 10  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Perhaps tomorow 
 
 I wil find my kite. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Now, I must go home, 
 
 before the wind starts 
 
 to roar again.
